General.Name: Pollux Properti Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Pollux Properties Indonesia Tbk operates as a property developer in Indonesia. It operates through Rent Office Room, Apartment, Hotel, Mall, and Others segments. The company develops apartments, condominiums, offices, shopping centers, hospitals, hotels, convention centers, housing, and industrial estates. In addition, it purchases, sells, leases, and operates real estate properties, as well as offers real estate services, such as agents, real estate brokers, and purchasing intermediaries. Further, the company provides specialist clinic, general polyclinic, medical center, and stem cell laboratory services. Additionally, it engages in the construction, mining, and transportation businesses. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pollux Properties Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Borneo Melawai Perkasa.
